summary.para: Specifies the architecture of a process and if that architecture of code can run in user mode, kernel mode, and/or under WoW64 on the host operating system.
An IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_* value indicating the architecture of the associated process. See the list of architecture values in Image File Machine Constants.
A value from the enumeration indicating if the process’s architecture can run in user mode, kernel mode, and/or under WOW64 on the host operating system.
